Text:
Any chance anyone knows where I can find the Mac OSX version of this program?
Having to download the windows version to use on my PC, but I'd like to be able to use it on my laptop. ^_^

Dumbie here!
Looks good (15 day trial) but cannot figure out "Copy crack(s) to application directory and overwrite".
Where are these cracks, and where is application directory??

Thanks, works like a charm.

to crack, just take the two files inside the /crack folder.. and paste in the installation directory, overwriting the original executables.

For Example.. my installation dir 
"C:\Program Files\Alias\Alias SketchBook Pro 2.0"
.. most likely yours too.
the crack folder is empty. prog works good for the 15 day trial but useless after that.
